contents:
Hi! I'm BloKit

A block construction toolkit with a standalone Block Editor so you can just write your blocks and test them right away, without having to rely on a WordPress installation.

It also loads some WordPress core blocks so you can emulate things, but don't expect everything to work as in the CMS, since we're just a simple implementation. If you need the serialized data as HTML, just click on "Get Serialized Data" above!

Now go code! 😎
